mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.etl.export.dhis2.RequiredValueException
mdException.label: Required Value Exception
mdException.message: The DHIS2 attribute(s) [{dhis2AttrLabels}] require a value, but one was not mapped. Make sure that the Geo-Object has a label in either your preferred locale, or your default locale at the date [{dateLabel}].

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.etl.export.dhis2.NoParentException
mdException.message: Could not find a parent of Geo-Object Type [{typeCode}] in hierarchy [{hierarchyCode}] at date [{dateLabel}]
